responsibilities: Architecting, building, and improving the scalability of our services and infrastructure.
Using Infrastructure-as-Code to build and improve the cloud infrastructure.
Improving observability (Logging, monitoring & alerting) using Elastic.
Improving high availability and disaster recovery planning, implementation, and testing.
Analyzing platform and infrastructure usage and performance metrics and develop capacity plans.
Providing L2 - L3 support for incidents by troubleshooting infrastructure and application issues including on-call support as part of the team rotation schedule.
Supporting engineering and business teams to resolve any issues they encounter around infrastructure and development.
Documenting in Confluence.
Collaborating with other DevOps and Product Operations team members.
Automating CI/CD pipelines & processes using Jenkins to rapidly deploy applications & services with quality, auditability, governance, and platform availability in mind.
Working with 3rd party infrastructure vendors.
Managing AWS environments.
Managing and maintaining RDS and EC2 instances.
Creating and managing S3 instances.
Creating and managing users, roles and policies on IAM via Terraform and Github.
Weekly application deployments via Harness.
Ingesting data to Snowflake databases.
Working with Aurora PostgreSQL database.
Using Redis.
Using Kafka.
Using Jira and Slack.
Implementing Agile Methodologies.
roles.description: Working on a customer service AI multi tenant platform.
Working on an internal repository inside an Azure platform called “Azure One” for Microsoft that allows users to build processes and give support to internal tickets.
responsibilities: Monitoring and maintaining huge builds of the platform.
Investigating build issues and fixing existing builds of projects.
Configuring and executed CI/CD pipelines for the project: Azure One.
Implementing Docker and Kubernetes containers in the infrastructure created by the development team.
Working on development for upgrades or updates to the pipelines using Kanban boards.
Changing pipelines and builds through Azure Board and Git for all the open tickets.
Working with branching on Git and service tickets.
Implementing Agile Methodologies.

roles.description: Working on an internal R&D project that focuses on virtualization.
responsibilities: Creating and deploying new virtual redhat machines for Junior engineers to work on their projects and designs.
Maintaining, improving and developing virtual environments.
Working with Linux, Docker, Kubernetes and AWS for creation of the infrastructure of the NXP APP.
Working with Bash scripting, C and .NET for coding and programming.
Deploying updates via Ansible playbooks or more recently via Salt Cloud.
Integrating through Jenkins and teamcity.
Developing improvements and deploying them.
Supporting engineers via ServiceNow tickets.
Merging old company’s name and infrastructure into the new one (Freescale to NXP).
Migrating thousands of users to a new OS Version.
Deploying new configuration to Vmware hosts.
Implementing Agile Methodologies.
Keeping all infrastructure secure, updating and securing configurations.
Installing patches and solving security tickets.
Engineering, implementing and monitoring security measures for the protection of computer systems, networks and information.
Identifying and defining system security requirements.
Configuring and troubleshooting security infrastructure devices.
Developing technical solutions and new security tools to help mitigate security vulnerabilities and automate repeatable tasks.
Using Redhat Linux to support and powers software and technologies for automation.
roles.description: Working for the hotel industry supporting the security systems for Marriott Hotel in Mexico.
